name: Add date of birth field in user registration page
description: Add date of birth field in user registration page
llmTaskExplanation: Add a 'date of birth' field to the user registration page. This involves updating the user registration form to include a new input field for the date of birth, ensuring it is properly validated and stored in the database.
validations: Date of birth must be a valid date.
Date of birth cannot be a future date.
Date of birth must be in the format YYYY-MM-DD.
Date of birth is a required field.
unitTests: Test that the form renders with a date of birth field.
Test that entering a valid date of birth allows form submission.
Test that entering a future date of birth shows an error.
Test that leaving the date of birth field empty shows an error.
Test that entering an invalid date format shows an error.
acceptanceCriteria: Given the user registration page, when a user views the form, then they should see a date of birth field.
When a user enters a valid date of birth and submits the form, then the registration should be successful.
When a user enters a future date of birth, then an error message should be displayed.
When a user leaves the date of birth field empty, then an error message should be displayed.
technicalDependencies: Date input handling library if not already used in the project.
security: Ensure date of birth input is sanitized to prevent injection attacks.
Log date of birth input errors for monitoring.
performance: Ensure the addition of the date of birth field does not significantly impact form load time.
businessContext: The date of birth field is likely required for age verification or demographic data collection.
otherNotes: Consider adding a feature flag if this change needs to be rolled out gradually.
